channel.title: Qt on Geek w/ god complex
channel.description: Recent content in Qt on Geek w/ god complex

item.title: Running QtCreator in Docker
item.description: Update:Â I wrote a follow up post detailing potential security risks of running GUIs in containers, check it out here. The first thing I ever tried installing from source was Qt. For those who don’t know, Qt is a cross platform framework for writing GUI applications. That was then… I was in college, I had a macbook at the time and I was toying around with writing GUIs with Python/Tkinter.
